Headline: #78 Montrose Temporary Reroute at Montrose/Milwaukee

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: Blue Line Trains bypassing Western (Forest Park Branch)
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) in both directions due to a police investigation.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running, but are still not stopping at Western (Forest Park Branch) in both directions due to a police investigation.

Shuttle buses are available between Kedzie and Illinois Medical District to provide connecting service.

Alternate service may include the #7 Harrison or the #126 Jackson bus. 

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
